QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(o.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when o.encid = '' or o.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(o.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, o.obs_type, o.obs_date, o.obs_time, o.obs_unit, o.obsresult as test_result, 'observations' as source, CASE WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'few' THEN 45878239 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'np' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'none' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'none seen' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'none see' THEN 45878582 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'negative' THEN 45878583 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'abnormal' THEN 45878745 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'present' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'pos' THEN 45879438 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'rare' THEN 45880295 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'trace' THEN 45881796 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'positive' THEN 45884084 WHEN lower(o.obsresult) = 'absent' THEN 45884086 ELSE NULL END AS ValueAsConceptId, CASE WHEN lower(obs_type) = 'smoke' THEN 1 WHEN lower(obs_type) = 'alcohol' THEN 1 WHEN lower(obs_type) = 'exercise' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Observation, 'oncology' source_type from {sc}.observations o JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND o.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(o.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
